WRITING.TITLE: Does anyone have the transcript for Chiang Kai-Shek's New Life Movement speeches?
WRITING.TEXT: I was doing some reading into the rule of Chiang's GMD and his rule over China, especially when compared to Sun Yat-Sen, and I wanted to find an example of his changes from the social democratic style of Sun's to Chiang's authoritarian style of rule. Does anyone know where I can find Chiang's speeches on the matter? Thanks.

An annoyingly simple achievement, if world tension doesn't become an issue. It's far easier to restart if the Allies guarantee any of your victims. The achievement is to have Finland, Sweden, Denmark and Norway all in one faction, and because democracies suck, puppets are your best bet.

WRITING.TEXT: People who use their sexuality as their definition I dislike. Quite frankly I dislike bringing it up unless I feel comfortable about talking about it because it's a personal aspect to my life. The fact that you might be gay, bi, pan etc. shouldn't be what you use as a cornerstone for your actions. Yes, be proud about it, but don't be pretentious.
https://m.imgur.com/xQOpWUr?r Full credit to /u/Theirishisraeli

A fine addition to my collection.

I think what everyone fails to realise is that we should respect opinions as long as they aren't actively harming anyone or being imposed on anyone. Politically I disagree with Trump, and I'll disagree with what a trump supporter might say if we get in a political discussion, but that's it. I'll never look down on someone if they have a different belief to me as long as it isn't actively harmful. But everyone, regardless of affiliation politically, should learn that someone does not have to agree with you.

My favourite avenged song, this is to me the pinnacle of the band. (The end repeat) Cry alone, I've gone awayyyyy no more nightsss no more pain. The middle bit, when the 'no more breath' part starts, or just before that. The best, as started before. I know this song is about suicide and it's a very touchy issue, and I don't condone it, but it's still incredible. 10/10.

One of the best songs they ever did. I FEEELL THAT TIMMMEEE PASSSSESSS BYYYY. Don't care about the vibe or the meaning, I'll keep listening until I'm gone in the black of the night. 10/10.

This one's got a special place in my heart. First song I ever listened to by them on a suggestion by my sister. A good one, but an overrated one. 'When sin's deep in my blood You'll be the one to fall' The drumming is just so good, especially between vocals. Probably about 3/4th down, there are underrated songs in WtF that are better. That blend of vocals which bring more mediocracy from the harsh sandpaper of Sounding shows the change of focus of the band for their new music going forward, and I support it. 7 or 8.

If you're in for orchestral, Deus Ex Human Revolution has a brilliant bunch. Personally, the first 3 Mass effect games have some brilliant tunes, Vigil, Leaving Earth or Suicide Mission. Old school? Gerudo Valley.

May will very likely win the election, due to the state Labour and the other parties are in and the short notice of it, giving her another five years on top of her unelected, essentially by default position of power. Unless Corbyn or Farron can pull a rabbit out of the hat we're looking at another Tory gov. And UKIP? Well, Paul Nutall couldn't organise a tea party.
